theorem_statement: \label{iden-2} Let $n$ be a positive integer and let $A$ be a set of positive integers. We have \begin{description} \item{(a)} \begin{equation} \sum_{k=1}^{n}N^p_A(k)\left(q_A^e(n-k)-q_A^o(n-k)\right)=\tau_A(n), \end{equation} \item{(b)} \begin{equation} \sum_{k=1}^nN^q_A(k)\left(p_A^e(n-k)-p_A^o(n-k)\right)=\tau_A^s(n). \end{equation} \end{description}

sections.title: Generating Functions for $N_A^p(n)$ and $N_A^q(n)$, and Six ways to Convolution and Recurrence Identities
Asymptotic Estimate of $N_A^p(n)$ when $A$ is a Finite Set
